definition: qualities that make sth popular or fashionable/(of a disease) epidemic
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A third crisis, pandemic influenza, lurks in the future.
sentences.chinese: 第三个危机是隐伏于未来的大流行性流感。

sentences.english: Epidemic typhus is passed from human to human by the body louse.
sentences.chinese: 流行性斑疹伤寒是由体虱在人与人之间传播的。

sentences.english: At least some pandemic viruses are known to have emerged following a reassortment event.
sentences.chinese: 至少，已知在重组发生后，出现了一些大流行性病毒。

sentences.english: AIDS has been an epidemic for years now across the globe.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病成为全球性流行性疾病已经很多年了。

sentences.english: The pandemic influenza vaccines are not expected to provide protection against other influenza viruses.
sentences.chinese: 未期望大流行性流感疫苗针对其它流感病毒提供保护。

sentences.english: Li Tao got the flu yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 李涛昨天患了流行性感冒。

sentences.english: Is there anyone who should not have the inactivated pandemic vaccine?
sentences.chinese: 是否有任何人不应当接种大流行性流感灭活疫苗？

sentences.english: She is down with la grippe and so is her cook .
sentences.chinese: 她在患流行性感冒，她家的厨子也病倒了。

sentences.english: The grippe hit unusually severely that year .
sentences.chinese: 流行性感冒来得异常凶猛。

sentences.english: So many people have flu that hardly any policemen reported for duty.
sentences.chinese: 患流行性感冒的人太多，连去执勤的警察也寥寥无几。

sentences.english: Human influenzas are divided into two groups, A and B.
sentences.chinese: 人类流行性感冒被分成A和B两组。

sentences.english: Using ether to spilt influenza virus to produce this vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 利用乙醚裂解流行性感冒病毒，制得该疫苗。

sentences.english: Likewise, the clinical picture of pandemic influenza is largely consistent across all countries.
sentences.chinese: 同样，大流行性流感的临床情况在各国大体一致。

sentences.english: This attack of influenza has crocked him up.
sentences.chinese: 这次流行性感冒把他的身体弄垮了。

sentences.english: This attack of influenza has really crocked him up.
sentences.chinese: 这次流行性感冒确实把他的身体搞垮了。

sentences.english: Strengthening disease surveillance for epidemic-prone diseases including malaria and dengue fever.
sentences.chinese: 加强对流行性疾病，包括疟疾和登革热的疾病监测。

pinyin: di4 fang1 xing4 ban1 zhen3 shang1 han2

definition: epidemic encephalitis B, aka Japanese encephalitis
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
